title: Метод Лавровой
overview: The main character Ekaterina Lavrova is the best investigator in the department. Even male colleagues admit to competing with her. But it accidentally changes her whole life. During the next special operation, Lavrova's hand trembled, and her partner was wounded in her vine. Ekaterina Lavrova leaves service in the Ministry of Internal Affairs and begins teaching criminology at the Academy of the Ministry of Internal Affairs.
